meanings.definition: The joint between the thigh and the lower leg in humans.
meanings.sent1: She fell and hurt her knees.
meanings.sent2: He bent his knees to tie his shoelaces.
meanings.sent3: The knees of the pants were worn out from crawling.
meanings.sent4: Her knees knocked together in fear.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's knees moved gracefully in the performance.

meanings.definition: The part of a garment covering the knee.
meanings.sent1: The dress had intricate lace detailing on the knees.
meanings.sent2: He patched the hole on the knees of his jeans.
meanings.sent3: The knees of the trousers were embroidered with flowers.
meanings.sent4: She felt a chill on her bare knees.
meanings.sent5: The knee of the pants had a small tear that needed mending.
